bow: how do you deal with people who claimed to be your best friend but as soon as you have kids they are no where to be found ve had this one best friend since 2010 and had baby this last year and suddenly she no where to be found see her stuff on other social media and she out bar hopping and has whole set of new friends that not really my thing since ve had baby and know growing apart is just the way of life but it kind of hurts right now by crying and starting therapy and my baby won even be here for another ten weeks but my besties are picking smoking bars over me and it hurts had really hard time with this had my first baby when lived really far away and thought my friends would want to hang out often when we moved closer planned girls weekend two months in advance and everyone but one person bailed days beforehand it hurts ton my only advice is to focus on the friends who make the time and effort for you in the end you can control what your best friend does but you can stop giving them all of your energy to maintain relationship that might be evolving into something different friends don always follow us through different seasons of life which sucks but you will drive yourself nuts trying to force it an old friend of my used to say that friends are in your life for season reason or for life took that to heart and its less painful when you realize that the season has passed and it not your fault or her fault that old friend and drifted apart our season passed but wish her well sounds like your friend is in different season of life wish her well and be there when your seasons align again if you want in the now try to find people in the same season as you and be kind to yourself lost one best friend but kept the other one its hard and so isolating motherhood changes you and sometimes people don understand or don try to understand the people who don get it aren worth your time and they aren acting much like best friend if they won even try you ll find other parent friends along the way and they ll understand the struggles you face so deeply and that wonderful thing just drop the friend not in mean way but to protect yourself and leave it open for future healing for you both hang in there ❤️ hear you was really close with my two cousins who live in the same city as me we used to bar hop together when we were younger and they have never really grown out of it since got married and had my first child few months later they are nowhere to be seen neither of them have ever even made an attempt to meet my son the one who am closest with has moved far away but been home several times since he has been born for holidays and vacations and only hangs out with her new friends and has never tried to come meet my little boy it kills me it ripped my heart out have very few friends as it is and these girls are my \*family\* still not over it but am very busy so try not to think about it amp x200b sorry you re going through this it sucks sorry that it happening to you too love this thank you you re right it just hard for me to make new friends thank you♥️♥️ sorry you re going through this too wish it was easier it is especially with new baby one thing wish done when my kids were younger was go to the mommy and me meetups in my community bet could have met so many other moms and possibly made connection you could always try something like that will once it gets warmer and he little older he months now this happened to me with my first pregnancy best friend of 10 yrs just up and ghosted me out of nowhere about months before was due we hadn fought or anything she hadn mentioned anything about wanting to end the friendship with either it really hurt and it still hurts yrs later the worst part is just not knowing why although my suspicion is she felt like was changing to much or leaving her behind in sense since was married and then having baby we were at different places in our lives but to me don know why that means the friendship had to end but it did for her guess have since made new friends who have children around my sons age it gets better you make new friends who understand your situation or find out which ones actually are your friends awesome good luck with that think most new moms feel your pain it hard to relate to others that are in the same stage of life as you true thank you for your kind words sorry about your bff too it never easy it so is and moved to new area about year before my son was born so that just adds to the no friends thing me too moved to new community few months before my oldest was born love where live but yeah soooo feel that he almost 10 now and still do really have anyone would consider friend you end up meeting parents of your kid friends but it not the same not the same timing around having child but two of my closest friends and subsequently the larger group of friends had for years stopped talking to me it had something to do with the election then rehoming her previous cat for my family same reason she gave him to me it hurt it hurt alot no happy birthday no nothing didn reach out because was so broken hearted couldn handle being yelled at about fucking cat was super close to her one son and haven seen him since nov of 2016 cried was angry unfollowed them on social media kept my distance from the larger group time has passed and in retrospect it was probably for the best but it took while to get over have daughter now and it sucks she will never meet them but she has other kiddo friends rejection sucks whether it be from school job romantic or friendship adjusting to being mother is no joke you look for every support network you have and to loose someone as dear and close is heart breaking am so sorry you are good person never loose sight of that sorry you re dealing with this do you have family you can talk to as well was on both sides of this was bit of hoodlum in my youth and couldn stand babies children so when friends got pregnant cut ties immediately because was an ass then got pregnant at 19 in 2010 and got healthy dose of my own medicine lost everyone if it wasn for my husband bf at the time staying by my side probably have gone off the deep end sorry this stuff always sucks and hurts swear know so many moms who experience this all my friends had their kids while we were still super super young and by the time had mine in my 20 they were past the baby home all the time phase was shocked kinda figured my friends without kids would taper off but did realize my friends with kids would as well it sounds weird and creepy maybe but we are very social at the park my ds is almost so we bring cheap dollar store sidewalk chalk or our bubble set and share with the other kids then the moms come over and we all get to talk and share supervision of the kids on lonely days this really saves me really love this got incredibly lucky and have two best friends married one and the other is my ride or die they are my only two friends but im absolutely happy with this your words are kind and well thought out thank you for that internet friend we re just in different places in life and that okay she happy with hers and happy with mine and unfortunately they re not compatible for scheduling or personality at this point it no ill will towards her she doesn understand what having is did to me or my life and she doesn understand how consumed am in motherhood give her the benefit of the doubt bless her and let it go no blame 🤷🏼‍♀️ going through similar situation but not with just one friend pretty much all of my friends they have dropped like flies pretty recently sahm so ca always go out so recently have tried to start biweekly game night with my friends have to make all the effort text them about said game night and get no response back and have to text again to see if they even recieved the first text have finally realized it time to make new friends this is very hard considering 30 and sahm with no family who live near for support my husband has been very supportive of my new initiative to make new friends all can say is making new friends is hard but trying to keep someone in your life who obviously does want to be in yours is worth the hassle either they are also not someone you want your child to be around and emulate because children watch everything we do hope you find some friends who want to be around you and your child this is super cool idea and will be doing it when the weather warms up my bestie backed off for while but now that my son is one she starting to come over again now that we can get sitter and have few beers again since done breastfeeding love the season mentality hopefully before he ten make friends but probably not little introverted understatement love this we re not old enough for the park yet but when we are we re doing this thanks hope find some too ve only had three consistent friends for the last 10 years and one moved away for college so that left me with two close ones and losing one is huge when that half you re group going to have to accept the season mentality seems to be very accurate when pregnant my whole friend group dropped off the face of the earth like the day we told them the spud is almost year old and they re slowly coming back guess they panicked when we took steps to be family and take on real adult responsibilities on purpose even it like we re all in our 30s now or something ugh found this to be hard too but once you let go you make room some of the best newer seasonal friends have been moms that share nothing with me other then the way we mother and we bond openly candidly and laugh at the same lame mom things together open up yourself for new friendships and don push them away because they feel unfamiliar feel this like still am down to have fun just need notice so can line up sitter or we can do other fun things that include my child thank you for that advice am definitely trying to be more open it really hard had two best friends one ve known since high school and the other goes all the way back to kindergarten when my son was born my high school friend showed up she very happily relinquished going out together and switched to hanging out at my house drinking coffee and chatting while lo plays my kindergarten friend just vanished lo is 13 months old and she met him twice know lucky that still have one good friend but do miss my kindergarten friend so much still it hard to lose 24 years of history so suddenly this reminds me sex and the city episode they talk about how once their friends get married they treat you differently because you re single same kind of concept you ve got your mom friends and you ve got your non mom friends you re just at different stage of your life now sorry that happened to you and wishing you well when told my best friend was pregnant with my first she went into helpful overdrive the whole pregnancy she was with me every step of the way and she was in the delivery room once he was out though she was no where to be found she watched him once so could take dear friend out for her birthday but unless it was us bar hopping she wasn interested otherwise the hurtful part was we become friends when she was parenting her kids who were 10 years at the time and she lamented that none of her other friends wanted to be around kids then as soon as had one she did the same thing ve got ton of single girlfriends since cant go barhop with them anymore we always schedule our mani pedis together know once every two weeks or sometimes just once month will get to catch up with them over foot massages and hot tea amp x200b one girlfriend is perpetually single always at the bars and traveling to cool music festivals shes got far better stories than ever will amp x200b one girlfriend is getting her master while working her way up the corporate ladder and has no time anyone ever but goddamn she is so smart conversations with her fascinate me to no end amp x200b one girlfriend just moved in with guy she been dating few months and they got dog together so she probably closer to me in life timelines than anybody else we never run out of things to talk about amp x200b so we are all in different places in life but we all realize that we love each other so much that it is 100 worth it to carve out time for one another and nothing says love you and love me like good pampering with my besties not weird nor creepy makes it easier for the shy moms like me to approach you down to one myself and she is talking about moving away she is also the only other person that lives close that trust with my son at least we can air our struggles out on reddit this site has helped me so much lately with being new mom that sounds like such good idea my lo just turned one and we are frequenting parks now and always see the groups of mom together and their children playing together and makes me little jealous will definitely start doing that though in hopes can meet more friends yeah chose to be sahm recently and some of my friends had weird reaction they went back to work and feel that my mere decision to stay at home confront them for example one told me to enjoy my maternity leave because it ends fast said would stay home she looked at me weird and said well my son really enjoys his day care and am just working days week right now so she was defensive and it stroke me as sahm will lose some of my working mom friends hope meet other sahms at some point dont have any right now girl that baby would love to hear the sounds of the park and get some sunshine lol started taking mine around 5mos just to get out 😂❤️ just accepted that we re focusing on different things grew closer to other people and now as the kids are older we re getting together more again babies just aren everyone cup of tea in their mind you re likely the one who not there anymore you re the one who drifted off never wants to get together never has any time and don want to do any of the stuff you used to do together or talk about anything but babies they don know how it is and you can really expect them to my daughter will be 10 next month and this still bothers me we had friends we see like times week with dance we help teach lessons with them and do practices together and same exact thing where did they go only one person from the group came to visit couple times it devastating to say the least fast forward to maybe years ago and one of the friends is talking about he feels so bad for this other couple he knows who recently had kid and would go over and help them out and watch the baby yeah felt pretty good to hear him apologize so many years later of how he totally dropped us still stings though making new friends is easier once they start preschool and you can set up play dates you get to know the parents and friendships between adults start up otherwise only survived with hitting up baby and me library programs and finding local mom groups it sucks to lose friends and then hope to find new ones that jive with your parenting style and have things in common internet hugs to you going through the same moved to new city away from my friends and family got pregnant and not one of them has come to visit me rarely ever even get text they don know what your going through and won until they have kid of their own one of my best friends didn even ask me to be bridesmaid in her wedding the thing that saved me was moms group find one in your area it important for you and for your little to see other babies and socialize today feeling very isolated and lonely needed to see this to know not alone babies love watching other kids play and getting the fresh air is great for both of you ca tell you how to get over it for lack of better way to say it can tell you that new types of friendships are headed your way though it sucks to go through this type of growing pains in friendships one day your friend will be there too but for now do what she is doing do what you want on your own time maybe you will see her now and then if so cool not just for moms dad here same thing goes on our end too feel ya am in the same boat sending you internet condolences we were best friends for almost 15 years and went through so much together she was there when met my husband she was even the ordained minister to marry us then our lo came along and she talked about how she was in love and we called her auntie and then one day poof she completely disappeared it is quite painful almost like mourning break up hopefully new mommy friends are in the future my best friend bailed on me before even had kids happened around the time got married still try to reach out and plan things but she always ends up canceling at the last minute ve tried accepting that we re not on the same page anymore but ve known her for over 20 years and it to walk away from that not creepy at all once exchanged numbers with woman at the park whose baby was around the same age as mine our babies were just really into playing together asked if could give her my number and she messaged me later so have hers she did hesitate at all and did seem bit weirded out we re all lonely sometimes and it easy to forget that other parents may feel just as isolated as you do if saw another parent at the park doing what you do think it was lovely babies love watching other kids and kids love babies so sure op babe would love it maybe try to talk to her about it let her know how you re feeling while trying to come from place of wanting to understand if she very good friend believe you can have that kind of honesty for all you know she going through something herself and this is her way of coping or maybe there level of her not knowing how to invite you to things or how to treat you now that you have little one personally want to be honest and talk about it one time maybe it will help and maybe it wo but it might help you feel better if you feel like you understand one another have to remember when have kids your experiencing things that am sure don include them at all anymore and when your finally ready for break and peel away from the kids and family we always expect them to be there waiting however we forget that there life is going on too am good friend but mom too and being parent seem to get stuck in our own world with our own family and life and honestly life happens am speaking tho from your side as parent myself end up getting so damn busy with sports with kids and parties for class mates and activities overlook what we had before all the to dos of life that comes the friends that kept closer where the ones that whenever we finally could make time are able to pickup like never had that time apart it just what happens with life ve never heard this expression but find it really helpful thanks for sharing it my dad said this to me my first few years out of high school and it really changed my perspective some people are meant to be in your life forever and some that do leave come back around eventually my bestie that has been in my life for 18 years stopped coming around once quit drinking and smoking then all together when got pregnant and had my baby it is super depressing we grew up together but once started working on myself we grew apart it is sad when try to reach out offer to take her out to lunch or offer to plan day out only to be regected or stood up it feels like bad breakup so deal with it like bad breakup learn from it and try my best to move on even though am utterly heartbroken completely feel this my 1st grade friend ca even come around with out being belligerent drunk told her did like her being so drunk around my baby and wooosh never to come around again it is heartbreaking to go through this and just want to tell you that feel you💜 fake friends it sad part of life we outgrow people hope eventually can find mom friends but haven found any yet everyone meet wants to do things not interested in like partying would rather be alone then have my life turn out like some of the people knew in high school also don have any family members it just me and my husband and baby hate to admit this but was this person always felt uncomfortable around kids had no idea what to do so friends with kids always kinda fell away there are few friends with kids expected to see more often but honestly it hard on them too they can always make time and sometimes it hard to work constantly on someone else schedule now have kids and very few friends but honestly will probably make more mom friends as my kids get older the baby season is lonely but kids won always be babies forever it just phase do know your friend or your relationship but can speak on both perspectives as ve now been on both sides when my friend had her kid really did want to overburden her with my company and also did know how to be supportive it would have been better to talk to her about it but chose the opposite and neglected the friendship now have kid and see the other side and how lonely it can get try to be really clear with people in my life what want meaning want company frequently and no they would be burdening me and try to talk to them about how our relationships are changing so maybe giving your friend benefit of the doubt and try to get together and talk to her if she avoids you then it will be clear where you stand but if she shows up that means she might be willing to join you as your relationship matures good luck mama amp x200b all my friends disappeared not long after had my baby and find it quiet hurtful as haven really got any one to hang out with anymore this advice is perfection and will carry it with me thanks for sharing
